name: Hotel Imperial las Perlas
description: The 2-star Imperial Las Perlas Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Cancun. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Imperial Las Perlas Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as air conditioning, balcony/terrace, telephone, television, satellite/cable TV. Access to the hotel's private beach, outdoor pool, massage, pool (kids), garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Cancun has to offer by making Imperial Las Perlas Hotel your base.
